conclusion: To solve the problem, I will analyze the image to identify how liquid flows through the system. I will follow the flow paths and determine which container is connected to the outlets. I will then apply this reasoning to predict which container the liquid will flow into.

The image shows four outlets: A, B, C, and D. Liquid flowing from these outlets will travel through the system.
Outlet A: Liquid flows to a baffle, then into a container.

Outlet C: Liquid flows to a different baffle, then into a container.
Outlet D: Liquid flows to yet another baffle, then into a container.

conclusion: Outlet D connects to container F.
